definition: Sing Tao, Hong Kong media group and publisher of Sing Tao Daily 星島日報|星岛日报
Sing Tao Daily, Hong Kong newspaper

sentences.english: If you do not want to receive our promotion material, please click here.
sentences.chinese: 假如阁下不希望再收到星岛日报优惠电邮，请按此处。

sentences.english: Please also refer to the published version of this announcement in The Standard.
sentences.chinese: 请同时参阅本公布于星岛日报刊登的内容。

sentences.english: This email was sent by Sing Tao daily limited.
sentences.chinese: 本电邮由星岛日报有限公司发出。

sentences.english: A portion of driveway near Sing Tao Communication Centre.
sentences.chinese: 星岛传理中心附近的部份车道。

sentences.english: A portion of driveway in front of Sing Tao Communication Centre and Christian Education Centre.
sentences.chinese: 星岛传理中心与基督教教育中心前的部份车道。

sentences.english: Driveway from Sing Tao Communication Centre to Fong Shu Chuen Car Park.
sentences.chinese: 星岛传理中心至方树泉停车场一段行车通道。

sentences.english: A portion of passageway between Sing Tao Communication Centre and Christian Education Centre.
sentences.chinese: 星岛传理中心与基督教教育中心之间的部份行人通道。

definition: Yingzhou, easternmost of three fabled islands in Eastern sea, home of immortals and source of elixir of immortality
Ziyun Hmong and Buyei autonomous county in Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou
palace of the Dragon King at the bottom of the Eastern Sea
Mercury in traditional Chinese astronomy/see also 水星[shui3 xing1]
Cangwu county in Wuzhou 梧州[Wu2 zhou1], Guangxi
Devil's Island, notorious French prison off the coast of French Guyana
